item.title: AAA (TACACS+) configuration for NDB
item.description: Today I integrated a NDB Controller VM with the ISE (TACACS) of a customer. As it wasn’t that easy to find the correct shell profile config, i thought that I will post it here as documentation ðŸ™‚ Possible cisco-av-pair’s for the NDB controller VM. Write (Admin) 1 shell:roles=network-admin Read (Admin) 1 shell:roles=network-operator
